node.text:
Ready to plan your island getaway? The First Stuffing Premiere of our new Animal Crossing™: New Horizons collection, starring the @merrelltwins is now live! Check out all the fun of Tom Nook and Isabelle!

UPDATE: We're so sorry but we have officially sold out. If you weren’t able to purchase the Animal Crossing™: New Horizons collection today, don't worry! We will have the collection back in stock soon!

US: https://www.buildabear.com/collections/shop-by-character/animal-crossing
UK: https://www.buildabear.co.uk/collections/shop-by-character/animal-crossing

#animalcrossingnewhorizons  #buildabear #merrelltwins

node.title: Animal Crossing™: New Horizons Collection First Stuffing Premiere!

node.text:
It's National Family Day, and what better way to celebrate than with our Build-A-Bear Family! Thank you so much to all of our fans that submitted clips to us for our newest music video, 'We Are Family'! We definitely felt a lot of love from you all! Check it out NOW!

#babwearefamily #buildabear

node.text: This Valentine’s Day, we’re introducing a NEW way to add a little more ❤ to life…Hearts ‘n’ Hugs Teddy! The best part of making your own is knowing we donate a teddy bear to Build-A-Bear Foundation for each made! Check out what happened when we invited kids and moms to the Workshop to join the mission and BEARlieve in the power of hugs!

node.title: Hearts ‘n’ Hugs Teddy | How to Donate a Teddy Bear!

node.text: Join the mission to donate 50,000 teddy bears to children in need when you post a photo of how you’re celebrating the special day on social media! Visit the Workshop now through Monday, September 9 to pick up an exclusive bear for only $/£6.50!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Build-A-Bear Workshop on September 13, 2021. May be a cartoon of text that says 'NEW! Online Exclusive Bear Bones Dino TRICK ROAR! TREAT'.

node.text:
NEW! Stomp away with Bear Bones Dino this Halloween! This prehistoric pal makes a dino-mite trick-or-treating partner. Available exclusively online. 

*Coming Soon to UK!

node.text: Light up the night with Pumpkin Glow Bear! This glowing gourd gives the cutest Halloween hugs and has a special light-up feature!

node.text: Happy #NationalTeddyBearDay! We’re celebrating the power of bear hugs all month long, and we want to see how you’re celebrating this SeptemBEAR! Show us your best bear look or teddy bear costume and be sure to tag your pics with #buildabear! 🐻💝🎉
